Description détaillée
Class used to manage Auth LDAP config

Open LDAP connection to current server

Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
connectToServer() connectToServerAuthLDAP AuthLDAPconnectToServer
static connectToServer ( $host, $port, $login = "" , $password = "" , $use_tls = false , $deref_options = 0 , $tls_certfile = "" , $tls_keyfile = "" , $use_bind = true , $timeout = 0 , bool $silent_bind_errors = false )[static]
Connect to a LDAP server
Paramètres
string$host
LDAP host to connect
string$port
port to use
string$login
login to use (default '')
string$password
password to use (default '')
boolean$use_tls
use a TLS connection? (false by default)
integer$deref_options
deref options used
string$tls_certfile
TLS CERT file name within config directory (default '')
string$tls_keyfile
TLS KEY file name within config directory (default '')
boolean$use_bind
do we need to do an ldap_bind? (true by default)
bool$silent_bind_errors
Indicates whether bind errors must be silented
Renvoie
resource|false|\LDAP\Connection link to the LDAP server : false if connection failed
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

Paramètres
string$date
datetime
Renvoie
string ldap timestamp

getObjectByDn() getObjectByDnAuthLDAP AuthLDAPgetObjectByDn
static getObjectByDn ( $ds, $condition, $dn, $attrs = [] , $clean = true , ?bool & $error = null )[static]
Get an object from LDAP by giving his DN
Paramètres
resource$ds
the active connection to the directory
string$condition
the LDAP filter to use for the search
string$dn
DN of the object
array$attrs
Array of the attributes to retrieve
boolean$clean
(true by default)
bool | null$error
Boolean flag that will be set to true if a LDAP error occurs during operation
Renvoie
array|boolean false if failed

getUsers() getUsersAuthLDAP AuthLDAPgetUsers
static getUsers ( $values, & $results, & $limitexceeded)[static]
Get the list of LDAP users to add/synchronize When importing, already existing users will be filtered
Paramètres
array$values
possible options:
authldaps_id ID of the server to use
mode user to synchronise or add?
ldap_filter ldap filter to use
basedn force basedn (default authldaps_id one)
order display order
begin_date begin date to time limit
end_date end date to time limit
script true if called by an external script
array$results
result stats
boolean$limitexceeded
limit exceeded exception
Renvoie
array
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

searchUserDn() searchUserDnAuthLDAP AuthLDAPsearchUserDn
static searchUserDn ( $ds, $options = [] , ?bool & $error = null )[static]
Get dn for a user
Paramètres
resource$ds
LDAP link
array$options
array of possible options:
basedn : base dn used to search
login_field : attribute to store login
search_parameters array of search parameters
user_params array of parameters : method (IDENTIFIER_LOGIN or IDENTIFIER_EMAIL) + value
condition : ldap condition used
bool | null$error
Boolean flag that will be set to true if a LDAP error occurs during operation
Renvoie
array|boolean dn of the user, else false
